text: the status of their relationship has been tensely debated for years since their explosive break-up . and rihanna in a candid interview with oprah winfrey tonight admitted despite its violent end she still loves ex-boyfriend chris brown . the 24-year-old singer confirmed to the talk show host in a revealing interview that the pair are still ` very close friends ' and that despite leaving her battered and bruised in the road after a vicious beating , she ` still loves him .
